# Skyrim Location Agent

This agent assists users with finding and learning about locations throughout Skyrim. Whether you're looking for a specific city, dungeon, landmark, or hidden area, this agent provides comprehensive information including lore, nearby points of interest, and navigation assistance for your adventures in Tamriel.
